quest_text: A local researcher has become so obsessed with what he discovered in the crumbling pyramid that no one has seen him for days. His distraught daughter wants you to find him
Rumors are that the long dead trickster illusionist Harkleboots has risen from his grave and is luring travelers in to see his deadly quote magic show, time to put a stop to it
After weeks of false alarms, there really may be a werewolf stalking those who walk alone at night. It is your job to find out if it is true.
What is going on at that old keep on the hill, and why is the name spelled incorrectly
